relation: Auxiliary Bishop of Guadalajara, Jalisco, México
textBeforeTable: Events Bishop of Celaya, Guanajuato --> Bishop Jose Benjamin Castillo Plascencia
textAfterTable: MicroData Summary for José Benjamín Castillo Plascencia: Bishop José Benjamín Castillo Plascencia (born 9 Sep 1945) Bishop of Celaya Ad Limina - May 2014: Bishop Ad Limina - May 2014: Bishop Please contact the Bishop through the Diocese of Celaya. a priest for 40.7 years a bishop for 15.0 years Principal Consecrator: Juan Cardinal Sandoval Íñiguez Archbishop of Guadalajara, Jalisco Principal Co-Consecrators: Archbishop Justo Mullor García Titular Archbishop of Volsinium Bishop Javier Navarro Rodríguez Bishop of San Juan de los Lagos, Jalisco Episcopal Lineage / Apostolic Succession: Juan Cardinal Sandoval Íñiguez (1988) Archbishop of Guadalajara, Jalisco Bishop Manuel Talamás Camandari † (1957) Bishop of Ciudad Juárez, Chihuahua Archbishop Luigi Raimondi † (1954) Titular Archbishop of Tarsus Adeodato Giovanni Cardinal Piazza, O.C.D. † (1930) Cardinal-Bishop of Sabina e Poggio Mirteto Basilio Cardinal Pompilj † (1913) Cardinal-Bishop of Velletri Antonio Cardinal Agliardi † (1884) Cardinal-Bishop of Albano Giovanni Cardinal Simeoni †
